text:
Hehe, yes!
For the live performance!

Because I want to express
a lot of gratitude to all the fans who come to see us!

I need to think about
what I can do, what Houkura can do...!

(Chiyoko really is someone who naturally
works hard for others, huh...)

(She's working hard on the live preparations,
and even created a secret base for Kaho...)

It's nothing, but how about a drink?
I have some excellent tea I received as a gift.

Oh, then I'll gladly accept...!
Thank you very much!

Producer-san, you always seem to be
looking out for someone else, don't you?
I need to learn from that...!
If that's how it looks... then I'm glad!
